short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to safely embed iframes in your GitHub README.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wanted to embed external content in your GitHub readme, Instagram.com posts, or other social media, and found that you couldn't? Look no further!
With gitmbed Chrome extension, you can do this with a simple image upload! Any visitor that sees this, and has the gitmbed extension, will automatically have this embed rendered in their browser!
